post_title: FS: Entire Southern League subset PSA graded. Average grade 4.08 - SOLD!
post_content:
GROUP IS SOLD!

Hey all, 

I've been looking to sell off a portion of my collection and have a full set of PSA graded Southern Leaguers available. This would be an all or nothing situation, I have no interest in parting this out.  If I cannot sell here, will likely consign this as a set.

My goal was to get all non-EPDG subjects in my 520 to a PSA 4 or 4.5 and I almost finished it with these Southern Leaguers. I have two PSA 3's, one PSA 3.5, 32 PSA 4's and 13 PSA 4.5's. The average grade is 4.08.  I have scanned all of the cards here: [url]https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1L9VVcJJmeuoL4dlYEuQUlI5YPxECDuXF[/url]


A PSA 5+ set (average 5.16) recently sold at REA for $45.6k plus taxes.

I would be asking $21k for this collection.

I can answer any questions you have via PM here. Have plenty of references. 

Thanks
Jeff

List of cards:
